reviewText: Robot Foods Afterbang, Lame and Afterlame have to be some of the best snowboard films of all time! I can watch these over and over year after year and they never get old! Thank you Robot Food for feeding us these true greats!

This has been the fav video for a while. i wish there were others as fun to watch. Also Filmed mostly with 16mm, the look and feel of cinematography is spectacular. Oh don't forget the bitchen sound track... A++
Simply the best snowboard film ever to be made or ever will be made. The soundtrack is phenomenal and unparalleled. The cinematography is equally amazing.
